statements: SELECT * FROM employee_training_records
SELECT employee_name, training_topic, training_duration FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT employee_name, training_topic FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_duration > 60
SELECT * FROM employee_training_records ORDER BY training_date DESC
SELECT employee_name, trainer_name FROM employee_training_records WHERE employee_id = 123
SELECT * FROM employee_training_records ORDER BY training_date DESC, training_duration ASC, trainer_name;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, training_topic, trainer_name FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_duration > 60;
SELECT employee_name, training_topic FROM employee_training_records WHERE trainer_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, employee_name FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_topic LIKE '%Database%' ORDER BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, training_duration FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY training_duration DESC, employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_records;
SELECT training_topic, trainer_name FROM employee_training_records WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM ethical_standards WHERE is_obligatory = TRUE;
SELECT standard_id, standard_name, description FROM ethical_standards ORDER BY standard_id DESC;
SELECT training_date, training_topic, training_duration FROM employee_training_records WHERE trainer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_duration > 60 ORDER BY training_date DESC, employee_id ASC
SELECT training_topic, trainer_name FROM employee_training_records WHERE employee_id = 123 AND training_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT DISTINCT trainer_name FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_topic = 'Leadership'
SELECT employee_id, training_topic, training_duration FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_topic LIKE '%Security%' AND training_duration >= 30
SELECT standard_name, description FROM ethical_standards WHERE is_obligatory = TRUE ORDER BY standard_id ASC
SELECT * FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_duration > 60 ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employee_details WHERE employee_position = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, training_id FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_topic = 'Leadership Training';
SELECT * FROM training_topics WHERE topic_category = 'IT' ORDER BY topic_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department, employee_position FROM employee_details WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department, employee_position FROM employee_details WHERE employee_department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_name;
SELECT employee_id, training_id, training_date, training_topic FROM employee_training_records WHERE employee_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM training_topics WHERE topic_category = 'Technical' ORDER BY topic_name ASC;

SELECT employee_name, training_date, topic_name FROM employee_details JOIN employee_training_records ON employee_details.employee_id = employee_training_records.employee_id JOIN training_topics ON employee_training_records.training_topic = training_topics.topic_id;
SELECT * FROM employee_records;
SELECT employee_name, training_date FROM employee_records WHERE ethical_standards_passed = true;
SELECT material_name FROM training_materials ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, material_name, completion_status FROM employee_records JOIN training_assignments ON employee_records.employee_id = training_assignments.employee_id;
SELECT auditor_name, audit_findings FROM compliance_audit WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_records WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employee_records WHERE training_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employee_records;
SELECT employee_name, material_name, assignment_date FROM employee_records JOIN training_assignments ON employee_records.employee_id = training_assignments.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, audit_date, audit_findings FROM employee_records JOIN compliance_audit ON employee_records.employee_name = compliance_audit.auditor_name;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department_name FROM employees
SELECT training_date, training_topic, completion_status FROM employee_training_records WHERE completion_status = TRUE
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_duration FROM training_courses ORDER BY course_duration DESC
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM departments WHERE department_name LIKE 'HR%'
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM training_categories
SELECT employee_name, department_name, position_title FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department_name FROM employees WHERE department_name = 'HR' AND position_title = 'Manager';
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM training_courses WHERE course_duration > 30 ORDER BY course_duration ASC;
SELECT employee_name, training_date, training_topic FROM employees JOIN employee_training_records ON employees.employee_id = employee_training_records.employee_id WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM training_categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5)
